name: TouchCrafters
description:
We are a team of exuberant individuals with professional enthusiasm. Our team is second to none whether it is complex programming or designs.
Most of our solutions are designed and implemented in real-time, multi-threaded, and resource-limited software development environments where performance and speed are top priorities. Most importantly we create a long-term relationship with each customer by combining creative and cost-effective web solutions.       
Technologies we work on:-    
+Java all editions and it's framework- Spring, Struts, Hibernate, Servlet, Quartz etc       
+Database- Mysql, SQL Server, Oracle databases, NoSQL, MongoDB    
+Frontend frameworks- Custom JavaScript, Jquery, AngularJS, ExtJS, Node.js, and Meteor      
+Programming- VB/.net, PHP, Objective-C, C++, Java etc.      
+Servers- Apache Tomcat, Websphere, JBoss, WAMP and more      
+Project management tools- Atlassian JIRA, Redmine, Mantis, Trello etc.
+Version control system- GIT, SVN +Domains- LMS, eLearning, ITSM, ITIL, SCORM     
+CMS- Hippo CMS, WordPress, Laravel, Drupal, Joomla, Magento    
Our genuine field of expertise lies wide and large, whether the work is for Application development, frontend, backend programming, logo and animation designing OR from simplified Website designs to complex coding….we exhibit it all.
